mixed-citation.article-title: New species, revision, and phylogeny of Ronzotherium Aymard, 1854 (Perissodactyla, Rhinocerotidae)

tp:treatment-sec.p: FRANCE – Laugnac • 1 scaphoid; MHNM .1996.17.94 • 1 lunate; MHNM .1996.17.21 • 1 pyramidal; MHNM .1996.17.20 • 1 unciform; MHNM .1996.17.98 • 3 astragali; MHNM .1996.17.41, MHNM .1996.17..55, MHNM .1996.17..77.
